See also: zurück-

German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

zu- +‎ Rücken; the former was zuo, zū, ze and the latter was rücke, rucke, rück, ruck, rügge, rugge in Middle High German.

Cognate with Hunsrik zurick and Dutch terug.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /t͡suˈʁʏk/
  • Hyphenation: zu‧rück
  • audio
    		(file)
  • Audio (Bavarian)
    		(file)

Adverb[edit]

zurück

  1. back, backwards, to the rear.

Interjection[edit]

zurück!

  1. stand back!

Related terms[edit]

  • zurücke

Further reading[edit]

  • zurück in Duden online
